story:
Once upon a time, in a land filled with love and kindness, there was a beautiful little girl named Lily. Lily was a kind and caring child who always tried her best to do the right thing. She loved her family and friends, and she spent her days playing and laughing with them.

One night, as Lily was getting ready for bed, she heard a soft tapping on her window. She went to investigate and saw a small bird with a broken wing. Lily felt sad for the bird and wanted to help. She carefully picked up the bird and brought it inside.

Lily made a small nest for the bird using a box and some soft cloth. She fed the bird and kept it company, praying for its wing to heal. Days turned into weeks, and the bird slowly began to get stronger. Lily was happy to see the bird's wing healing, and she knew that her prayers were being answered.

One day, the bird's wing was fully healed, and it was time for it to fly back home. Lily opened the window and watched as the bird soared into the sky. She felt a sense of joy and gratitude, knowing that she had played a part in helping the bird.

From that day on, Lily knew that she could always trust in God to guide her and help her do the right thing. She went to bed with a peaceful heart, looking forward to the adventures that the next day would bring.

And so, my dear daughter, as you drift off to sleep tonight, remember that God is always with you, watching over you and guiding you. Trust in Him, and you will always find the strength and courage to do the right thing. Goodnight, sweet dreams and may God bless you always.
